main.name: Dorel Saig
main.occupation: B.Sc. Software Engineering Student, Specialize in Mobile Systems Development
main.description: Looking forward for my First Shot in making the Impossible by
main.jobDescription: shuffling some data, learning new Tech and pressing some keys until everything is up and running.
main.bio: I am currently in my third year of studying B.Sc. Software Enggineering at Afeka College of Engineering in Tel-Aviv. I am an artist in my soul, a fighter in my head, and a social lover in my heart. hard-successful working in both team and self-directed settings. Quick learner, fully motivated, and ready to EXPLORE
main.contactmessage: Am I what your company looking for? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email.

resume.skillmessage: I am always ready to learn new technologies, Meanwhile, these are the ones that I have already took over

education.school: Afeka College of Engineering in Tel-Aviv
education.description: Here I took my Bachelors of Software Engineering with a Mobile Systems Specialty. In the course of my studies I've achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. I discovered my passion about mobile and software development
While making my way to the Matriculation Certificate I took major in Social Sciences, Computer Sciences and Visual Art

work.title: Shift Supervisor, Security Officer and Control Room Inspector
Team Leader, Ground Attendant
work.description:
- Providing high-quality service to passengers in compliance with aviation procedures 
- Staff management of 2 – 20 ground attendants 
- Real-time decision making for optimization and scheduling  
- Working around the clock carrying out several tasks simultaneously. 
- Position required excellent interpersonal communication skills

military.title: Combat squad commander and Company sergeant major
Combat squad commander
military.description: Honorably discharged as First Sergeant. Led my teams to multiple achievements of excellence during mandatory and reserve duty

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Java was my first programming language that I started using in college years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

skills.name: Android
skills.description: Android is my first mobile profession

skills.name: Swift
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

projects.title: Tournament’s bracket managing system (Java)
projects.description: Designed program with the fundamentals of OOP using javafx and MVC design patterns;

projects.title: Obstacles 2 - Android Mobile Game
projects.description: The game was developed in an Android Studio IDE and includes using of various SDKs, Google Maps API, Location Services, Sensors and Shared-Preference DB.

projects.title: SuperMe - Shared Groceries Lists Android App
projects.description: Java based application, the app includes the use of Google Firebase features: Firebase Authenticator, Firestore and Firebase Storage. Also, support of a real time features like sharing lists by phone numbers, sending notifications to friends and adding your own items.

projects.title: Airport autority & airline managing system (C)
projects.description: System was built in Windows and Linux environments using pointers, dynamic allocation, starctures, data to text file saving etc.

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors - IOS Mobile Game
projects.description: Swift based game, featuring a the classic game of Rock, Paper, Scissors. This was my first time using Swift and Xcode.

testimonials.text: I've been to Disneyland, like, 10 times. I'm getting really tired of Disneyland.
